text: Lindenwold is a borough in Camden County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 census, 21,641 people lived there.QuickFacts Lindenwold borough, New Jersey, United States Census Bureau. Accessed December 22, 2022.Total Population: Census 2010 - Census 2020 New Jersey Municipalities, New Jersey Department of Labor and Workforce Development. Accessed December 1, 2022. == References == Category:Boroughs in New Jersey Category:Camden County, New Jersey
title: Lindenwold, New Jersey
